description: What do Nottingham Forest need as Cooper calls for 'more players'?
title: What do Nottingham Forest need as Cooper calls for 'more players'?
title_page: What do Nottingham Forest need as Cooper calls for 'more players'? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Nottingham Forest continued their pre-season preparations with a 2-0 defeat to Leeds United on Thursday night.
After the match Steve Cooper praised new signing Anthony Elanga but stated he still "needs more players".
What and who do you think Forest need to improve before the season starts?
Have your say here
